content: What do you think of this spot? Unobstructed vistas from the mountains to the sea... it's the perfect place to take in an awe-inspiring spectacle.
info: 布置流星雨场地-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A挠头}Ah, pardon me, I'd like to invite you to help set up the viewing spot for the meteor shower.
info: 布置流星雨场地-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Here's a <style=Highlight>Blueprint</style> I prepared for you. Feel free to set up furniture and transplant flowers and trees, and make this place into everything you've ever wanted.
info: 布置流星雨场地-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}I'll leave this all in your capable hands! Come find me at the Camp once you're ready to begin.

content: {A想象}Maybe you'd like to <style=Highlight>invite the Neighbors</style> to watch the meteor shower as well. You can even share a few ideas on what they might wear. Hohoho... A moment like this is certain to have everyone looking forward to being together.
